topic.title: Improving Access to Psychological Therapies Care Professional
topic.shortdesc: An Improving Access to Psychological Therapies Care Professional provides evidence-based psychological therapies for PATIENTS with anxiety and depression, in line with National Institute for Health and Care Excellence (NICE) guidelines.
